Look at only the Word and Getsure comprehension form

```{r summary comprehension}

comprehension<- uni_joined%>%filter(measure=="understands")
lang<-comprehension%>%group_by(language)
summarise(lang, mean_prop=mean(prop), nb_reports= n(), nb_lemma=n_distinct(uni_lemma))
```
